GameEnvironment

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameEnvironment.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Desc: Game Environment that stores all the implementations, datas, and other stuff that is related to the Spaceship game.
    Author:
    sna134 and cyh29

      • crewInfo

        public static boolean crewInfo(java.lang.String tempName,
                               java.lang.String tempType)
        Desc: Stores the crew's information and making sure that it does not contains the same crew's name. Also, limited to one of Medic and one of Tactical Commander.
        Parameters:
        tempName, - a variable that receives the crew's name.
        tempType, - a variable that receives the crew's type.
        Returns:
        Returns true if one of these conditions is met. Otherwise, returns false.

      • crewVerification

        public static boolean crewVerification(int dayCheck,
                                       int countCheck,
                                       java.lang.String nameCheck)
        Desc: A function that verifies that the user does input a correct format for each of them.
        Parameters:
        dayCheck, - a variable that receives the user's input for days
        countCheck, - a variable that receives the number of crew members
        nameCheck, - a variable that receives the name of its crew team
        Returns:
        Returns true if all the verifications are met. Otherwise, returns false.

      • crewInfoVerification

        public static boolean crewInfoVerification(java.lang.String nameCheck,
                                           java.lang.String typeCheck)
        Desc: A function that verifies that the user does input a correct format before adding a crew into the team.
        Parameters:
        nameCheck, - a variable that receives the user's input for crew's name.
        typeCheck, - a variable that receives the user's input for crew's type.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the verification is met. Otherwise, returns false.
